title: Programming/software development
description: The planning, design, creation, amendment, verification, testing and documentation of new and amended software components from supplied specifications in accordance with agreed standards.

levels.description: Uses development tools and programming languages to develop simple programs and software components. Performs standard tests on software components.
Designs, codes, verifies, tests, documents, amends and refactors simple programs and scripts. Applies agreed standards and tools to achieve a well-engineered result.
Designs, codes, verifies, tests, documents, amends and refactors moderately complex programs and scripts. Applies agreed standards and tools to achieve a well-engineered result.

Designs, codes, verifies, tests, documents, amends and refactors programs and scripts of significant complexity. Collaborates in reviews of specifications and uses these to design, code and test software.
Takes technical responsibility for programming and software development activities. Plans and leads programming tasks. Influences the design of software components.
Takes overall responsibility for software development and programming activities within a significant development programme.

title: Solution architecture
description: The design and communication of high-level structures to enable and guide the design and development of integrated information and technology solutions.

levels.description: Assists with the design of components of solution architectures consistent with agreed enterprise and solution architecture standards, policies and approaches.
Designs components of larger solutions and ensures design consistency across projects.
Designs solutions comprising multiple architectural components, ensures design consistency and coordinates design activities across multiple teams.
Takes responsibility for the development and integrity of a solution architecture and contributes to enterprise architecture.
Takes overall responsibility for the integrity and evolution of solution architectures within a significant programme or organisation.

title: Relationship management
description: The identification, analysis, management and monitoring of relationships with and between stakeholders.

levels.description: Contributes to relationship building activities. Collects feedback from stakeholders.
Builds and maintains effective working relationships with stakeholders. Facilitates collaboration between different groups.
Builds, manages and maintains strategic relationships with stakeholders. Influences stakeholder decisions.
Develops long-term strategic relationships. Creates frameworks for stakeholder engagement.

title: Requirements definition and management
description: The elicitation, analysis, specification, validation and management of requirements.

levels.description: Assists with requirements elicitation and documentation under guidance.
Investigates, defines and documents requirements for moderately complex systems.
Facilitates requirements workshops and manages complex requirements.
Takes responsibility for requirements management across multiple projects.

title: Testing
description: The planning, design, management, execution and reporting of tests using appropriate testing tools and techniques.

levels.description: Executes test scripts under supervision.
Designs test conditions and creates test scripts and test data.
Reviews requirements and specifies test conditions. Creates test scripts and test data.
Plans and manages testing activities. Creates test strategy and manages test teams.
Takes responsibility for testing strategy and test management across multiple projects.

title: Data analysis
description: The investigation, evaluation, interpretation and classification of data.

levels.description: Uses standard techniques to analyse data. Presents findings clearly.
Investigates data requirements and sources. Applies analytical techniques.
Plans and manages data analysis activities. Designs analytical approaches.
Takes responsibility for data analysis strategy across the organisation.

title: Service provisioning
description: The provision of services to enable operation of products and systems.

levels.description: Assists with basic service provisioning tasks under supervision.
Provisions standard services using established procedures.
Provisions complex services and resolves provisioning issues.
Plans and manages service provisioning activities.
